name: Nausicaa Mashup
description:
Date: 08/2003

Disclaimer: Characters & music © Studio GHIBLI

Goal:
Calm down enough Ohmu to turn the sky blue. Ohmu eye-color changes from red to blue according to their rage level.

Controls:
- Click in the middle of the screen to drop flash grenades. 
- Reload by clicking on the face in the lower left corner of the screen.
- Click on bonuses flying around to change your character and gain a little more life.
- Leave the game by clicking the icon in the upper right corner.

History
After a long series of Futurama Flash games, this piece was a final combo breaker. My vectorization skills became quite handy, as I had to redraw all the characters and animations from anime.
